verses.text:
Behold, \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* ye the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, all \add ye\add* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, which by \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

Lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* your \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \add in\add* the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, and \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 134.2 \ft the sanctuary: or, holiness\f*
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee out of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.
